Polisi Setop Penyelidikan 'IG Porno' Hotman Paris
06 Nov 2019, 12:40 by Samsudhuha Wildansyah
Jakarta - Polda Metro Jaya menghentikan penyelidikan dugaan penyebaran konten porno di akun Instagram Hotman Paris. Polisi tidak menemukan cukup bukti untuk melanjutkan perkara yang dilaporkan oleh Farhat Abbas itu ke tingkat penyidikan.
"Subdit IV Tipidsiber pada Kamis 31 Oktober 2019 menerbitkan Surat Ketetapan Penghentian Penyelidikan (SP2LID) atas pelapor Farhat Abbas terkait dugaan tindak pidana menyebarkan video yang bermuatan kesusilaan melalui media elektronik," kata Kabid Humas Polda Metro Jaya, Kombes Argo Yuwono kepada detikcom, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Polisi beralasan, kasus itu dihentikan karena tidak ditemukan unsur pidana dalam postingan yang di-capture oleh pelapor tersebut.
"Pertimbangan hukum dikeluarkannya SP2LID dengan alasan belum ditemukan peristiwa pidana," jelas Argo.
Argo juga menyebut pihak pelapor yakni Farhat Abbas tidak bisa menunjukkan bukti-bukti yang kuat dalam kasus itu. Pelapor dikatakannya tidak bisa menunjukan jika video porno yang dilaporkan itu bersumber dari akun medsos milik Hotman Paris.
"Alat bukti yang diajukan pelapor atau saksi yang sudah diklarifikasi tidak dapat menunjukkan sumber video berasal dari akun IG resmi Hotman," kata Argo.
Sebelumnya Farhat Abbas melaporkan Hotman Paris ke Polda Metro Jaya atas dugaan penyebaran konten porno di IG. Konten berupa video dan foto itu diposting pada tanggal 28 Juli 2019.
Hotman menyebut dirinya tidak tahu soal postingan itu. Sebab, pada Sabtu (27/7) malam, ia berada di kelab malam Mexicola, Bali. Pada saat itu, ponselnya hilang dan ia melaporkan kehilangan itu ke polisi dengan nomor laporan bernomor LPC/2899/VII/2019/Bali/Res.Badung/Sek.

(sam/mei)

Police Stop Investigation of 'IG Porno' Hotman Paris
Nov 6 2019, 12:40 by Samsudhuha Wildansyah
Jakarta - Polda Metro Jaya has stopped investigating the alleged spread of pornographic content on Paris Hotman Instagram account. The police did not find enough evidence to continue the case reported by Farhat Abbas to the level of investigation.
"Tipidsiber Subdit IV on Thursday, October 31, 2019 issued a Letter to Determine the Termination of Investigation (SP2LID) for reporter Farhat Abbas regarding alleged crime of spreading videos containing morality through electronic media," Metro Jaya Police Public Relations Commissioner Commissioner Argo Yuwono told AFP on Wednesday (Wednesday). 11/06/2019).
The police reasoned, the case was stopped because no criminal element was found in the post that was captured by the reporter.
"Legal considerations of the issuance of SP2LID on the grounds there has not been found a criminal event," Argo explained.
Argo also said the reporting party, Farhat Abbas, could not show strong evidence in the case. The reporter said he could not show if the pornographic video reported was sourced from the social media account of Hotman Paris.
"The evidence submitted by the reporter or witness who has been clarified cannot show the source of the video comes from the official IG account of Hotman," Argo said.
Previously, Farhat Abbas reported Hotman Paris to the Jakarta Police on suspicion of spreading pornographic content on IG. Video and photo content was posted on July 28, 2019.
Hotman said he did not know about the post. Because, on Saturday (7/27) night, he was at the Mexicola nightclub, Bali. At that time, his cellphone was lost and he reported the loss to the police with a report number numbered LPC / 2899 / VII / 2019 / Bali / Res.Badung / Sek.

(sam / may)
